attributes.action:
Call a snap General Election. 
Show us who is the Bull and who is the herd!
attributes.additional_details:
Our Prime Minister clearly believes the man the country still supports. Let it be proved before he is forced out by his treacherous party.
We must respect the will of the people.
attributes.background: Call a snap General Election whilst Boris Johnson is still in Downing Street. No democratic process has been used to put Mr Johnson in this position. Give Boris Johnson the chance to demonstrate that the people still support him. Demonstrate the will of the people!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781

Decisions about the leadership of the Conservative Party and individual candidates for a General Election are a matter for the Conservative Party and local members, not the Government or Parliament.
